testsuite.name: Executing eg:demo with a source document, a document having @xml:id, and a wrapper element name

testcase.name: returns the document, wrapped and having the specified ID.
The original document is also available at an output port
and an incorrect expected result appears in the HTML report.
With embedded nodes and no @test, select='/' is optional (XProc only).
For access to all output ports, omit x:expect/@port.
